data.text: During my tenure at Nokia, the 8910i was one of my all time favorite mobile phones. The Nokia 8910i was a mobile phone announced on 4 November 2002 and released in early 2003. It had a metal titanium casing and a chromium-plated keypad and felt like the first cool step into the colourful wireless world, but with a neat premium feeling to it thanks to the titanium. There were for sure also nice mid-priced products that built volume. I feel proud to have worked for Nokia in my career; consistently delivering its brand promise - connecting people - the iconic tagline that represented Nokia's commitment to bringing people across the world together through mobile technology. Forever grateful for all learnings and ideas on purpose driven #comms and #marketing that was passed on for later career steps, and above all, the brilliant friendships built among colleagues üëç.
